names.pinyin: hei long bu shen zhu yang fang
names.english: black dragon supplement the kidneys and assist yang formula
names.commonEnglish: Black Dragon Supplement the Kidneys and Assist Yang Formula

actions: Invigorates and tonifies the Blood.
Tonifies Qi and Blood, strengthens the Spleen and raises the Yang Qi of the Spleen and Stomach.
With Hong Shen, for Qi Deficiency with general debility, anorexia, fatigue, tired extremities and spontaneous sweat.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing.
With Dang Gui and Bi Shao, for irregular menstruation and uterine bleeding from exhausted Liver and Kidneys.
Nourishes the Blood, regulates menstruation, astringes Yin and adjusts the Ying and Wei.
With Gan Cao, regulates the relationship between the Liver and Spleen.
With Dang Gui, nourishes Yin and Blood.
With Hong Shen, restrains sweating from Deficiency.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood and disperses Cold.
With Huang Qi, for Qi and Blood Deficiency.
With Bai Shao, regulates and harmonizes Qi and Blood.
Nourishes Kidney Yin, moistens the Lungs and generates fluids.
Nourishes Lung and Stomach Yin, generates Fluids, clears the Heart and eliminates irritability.
With Tian Men Dong, for Lung and Kidney Yin Deficiency with consumptive cough and occasional hemoptysis.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
With Yin Yang Huo, for chills and impotence with Cold sperm, cold extremities and infertility.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and Body Fluids, tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin, strengthens Kidney Yang, stabilizes the menses and stops bleeding.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine and benefits the Kidneys and Spleen.
Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang.
With Huang Qi, for spontaneous sweat and chills due to Yang Deficiency.
Tonifies Qi, generates Body Fluids and stops thirst.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Hong Shen, relieves palpitations and anxiety.
Warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Heart, strengthens Yang and Ming Men Fire and assists in the generation of Qi and Blood.
With Zhi Fu Zi, powerfully tonifies Kidney Yang, for Kidney Yang Deficiency with lower back pain and weakness in the legs and knees.
Nourishes Yin
Strengthens Yang

symptoms: Low back and lower leg soreness and weakness
manifestations.pulse: Deep, thready and forceless or Deep, thready and rapid
